api_en

Class CAG.Polygon2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • api_en.AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype
      • api_en.CAG
        • api_en.CAG.Polygon2D
  • Enclosing class:
    CAG

    public static class CAG.Polygon2D
extends CAG
    2D polygons are now supported through the CAG class. With many improvements (see documentation): 
     - shapes do no longer have to be convex
 - union/intersect/subtract is supported
 - expand / contract are supported
    But we'll keep CSG.Polygon2D as a stub for backwards compatibility
